Title: Upload CSV in Testsets and add production logs to a testset
introduction:
Weâ€™ve improved Testsets to:  
- Easily upload your testset for prompt experiments. 
- Use production logs to directly test your prompt with real-world test cases.

New.description: Revamped Lab to make it easier to create and run prompt experiments.
Redesigned the Overview panel to make it easier to track prompt versions and performance.
Group traces across sessions - you can now group traces by assigning a Trace group ID to each trace.
You can now view LLM logs with variables directly in the side panel. This makes it easier to separate the original prompt template and the populated version.

Improved.description: Improved the side panel in Traces; you can now see more details about each trace.
Added View Code for Load Balancing.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where prompt filters were not working.
Fixed a bug where calling DeepSeek R1 would call GPT-4.
Fixed a bug where sometimes there was no output in the playground.
Fixed a bug where users couldn't import a new prompt in Lab.
